name: ccapdev_mco2_forkast_final-main
description: How to load the "Forkast" website: First, in the "CCAPDEV_MCO2_FORKAST_final-main" file, open the file in terminal;  then input: "npm init" then keep typing Enter until it ask "Is this OK? (yes)" ,type yes;  then type "npm i express express-handlebars body-parser mongoose bcrypt express-session" after install those libraries; after the installation is finished, type "node app.js"; then you can see it's listening in port 3000; open a web page and type the link: "localhost:3000";
